location: A room in the Garter Inn.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Sir, the Germans desire to have three of your horses: the duke himself will be tomorrow at court, and they are going to meet him.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: What duke should that be comes so secretly I hear not of him in the court. Let me speak with the gentlemen: they speak English

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Ay, sir Ill call them to you.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: They shall have my horses but Ill make them pay Ill sauce them: they have had my house a week at command I have turned away my other guests: they must come off Ill sauce them. Come.
